page.title: 17Clubs in Bishop Monkton 1
page.content:
{ {Women's Institute}The WI owns the hall and let it out to other clubs.Meetings are held monthly.They organise whist drives on alternate Fridays,outings, annual dinner. 48 members
{Mechanics Institute.}Open every evening.There are 25 members with a minimum age of 14 years.Members of Markington billiards league.
{Youth Club.}60 members.Age range from 7 to 15 years.Meet every Friday except during school summer holidays.
{Ladies Group.}25 members.Monthly meetings are held in member's home, with a speaker.It is a non-profit organisation and any profit made goes to charity.
